item.title: Erosion ‘Gameplay Walkthrough’ video
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

A four-minute guide through an early quest in the game.

Publisher Lyrical Games and developer Plot Twist have released a four-minute gameplay walkthrough video of Erosion, the newly announced Wild West open-world time-looping roguelike action game.

The footage guides viewers through an early quest in the game and highlights how the different choices players make ripple across timelines.

Here is a brief overview of the game, via Lyrical Games:

Erosion is a time-looping open-world roguelike that fuses chaotic action and meaningful narrative in a living post-apocalyptic Wild West, where every death advances a decade.

Journey across time to save your daughter from a ruthless warlord, where failure means another chance, but at a devastating cost. Explore a faction-divided wasteland to build your arsenal and reshape the fates of its eccentric inhabitants across shifting timelines. Join a chicken cult, steal a slick new ride, race it to earn Cheddar, then gamble it all away in the Al Cashino. Descend into the mysterious Pillar to battle through chaotic, destructible dungeons, fighting to get one step closer to saving your daughter or losing her entirely to time itself.

Erosion is due out in Early Access for Xbox Series and PC via Steam and Microsoft Store in spring 2026, followed by a full release across PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC later in 2026.
